main event: An unidentified round object was observed over Morocco on 8 September 1960, exhibiting bright orange-red color and high speed.
interesting points: The object was observed to maneuver off and on a straight course,The sighting lasted for 3-5 seconds,The object was estimated to be between the size of a telephone and a basketball,The object was seen at an elevation of around 45 degrees,There were no signs of radar tracking or identification as a known aircraft or natural phenomenon.
witness description: Civil Engineer, 56 years old, and two other witnesses
